summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of North 68th Street, from Greenwood Avenue to West Green Lake Way, by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7575 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
